video.title: How to Get Away with Murder
video.synopsis: Brilliant criminal defense attorney and law professor Annalise Keating, plus five of her students, become involved in a twisted murder case.

episodes.synopsis: A tough criminal law professor challenges her brightest students to solve thorny cases, but five scholars soon learn the high price of impressing her.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Annalise challenges her students to prove the innocence of an eccentric millionaire suspected of his wife's murder; Wes may be harboring secrets.
episodes.title: It's All Her Fault

episodes.synopsis: A soccer mom arrested for a petty crime turns out to be a terrorist; Annalise represents a college football star linked to Lila's disappearance.
episodes.title: Smile, or Go to Jail

episodes.synopsis: Annalise and her students dig up a shocking truth when the head of a brokerage firm is arrested for insider trading; Wes discovers an unsettling clue.
episodes.title: Let's Get to Scooping

episodes.synopsis: Annalise represents a minor who shot his police officer father; Annalise and Sam argue over Lila; Wes and Rebecca question Annalise's motives.
episodes.title: We're Not Friends

episodes.synopsis: A case gets personal for Annalise and the team when their client is a man sentenced to death by Asher's father; Frank tries to find Rebecca.
episodes.title: Freakin' Whack-a-Mole

episodes.synopsis: When the judge enforces a gag order in Rebecca's case, she takes matters into her own hands; Michaela is surprised by a prenuptial agreement.
episodes.title: He Deserved to Die

episodes.synopsis: The team represents a woman on trial for killing her nanny; a shocking discovery in Lila's case tests loyalties; more is revealed about Sam and Lila.
episodes.title: He Has a Wife

episodes.synopsis: On the evening of the bonfire, future flashes finally sync with the present, and the exact circumstances of Sam's death are finally revealed.
episodes.title: Kill Me, Kill Me, Kill Me

episodes.synopsis: As the team helps Annalise search for Sam, it is unclear how much Annalise really knows; a surprise visitor makes things harder on the students.
episodes.title: Hello Raskolnikov

episodes.synopsis: As school resumes after winter break, the campus is abuzz over Sam's disappearance; while Hannah probes, Annalise takes on a client who is in the mob.
episodes.title: Best Christmas Ever

episodes.synopsis: A shocking discovery in Sam's case changes everything for Annalise and the team; the students find themselves on a tricky case that involves the mob.
episodes.title: She's a Murderer

episodes.synopsis: Wracked with guilt, Annalise turns to an unlikely source for help; Bonnie is tasked with representing a new client accused of rape.
episodes.title: Mama's Here Now

episodes.synopsis: A priest is accused of killing another man of the cloth; suspicion grows between Wes and Rebecca; the pieces of Lila's murder start to fit together.
episodes.title: The Night Lila Died

episodes.synopsis: Wes, Michaela, Connor and Laurel find themselves caught in a bind before the truth about Lila's death can be brought to light.
episodes.title: It's All My Fault

episodes.synopsis: While the others reel from Rebecca's disappearance, Annalise and Frank keep the truth a secret and covertly try to find the culprit.
episodes.title: It's Time to Move On

episodes.synopsis: Annalise scrambles to defend her sibling clients against surprising new charges and, later, endures a grueling cross-examination.
episodes.title: She's Dying

episodes.synopsis: Annalise agrees to defend an elite sex club owner. Later, a damaging photograph casts fresh suspicion on her sibling clients accused of murder.
episodes.title: It's Called the Octopus

episodes.synopsis: Wes uncovers more details about Rebecca's disappearance, and Connor suffers a crisis of conscience defending a girl accused of murdering her friend.
episodes.title: Skanks Get Shanked

episodes.synopsis: While the team grows anxious about getting arrested, Wes probes further into Rebecca's disappearance and finds himself in a volatile situation.
episodes.title: Meet Bonnie

episodes.synopsis: Annalise defends a transgender teacher against charges of murder, leaving the rest of the team to handle the increasingly tricky Hapstall case.
episodes.title: Two Birds, One Millstone

episodes.synopsis: Eve defends Nate against charges that he murdered his wife, and Annalise takes on a client accused of harassing someone into suicide.
episodes.title: I Want You to Die

episodes.synopsis: After Philip blackmails Annalise, new evidence reveals a shocking secret about his past. Catherine and Caleb ponder taking a plea deal.
episodes.title: Hi, I'm Philip

episodes.synopsis: When Sinclair's feud with Annalise reaches a dreadful climax, Annalise pressures one of the Keating 5 to cover up the incident.
episodes.title: What Did We Do?

episodes.synopsis: Annalise begins to recover but suffers from hallucinations. Meanwhile, Wes sets out to learn how Annalise knew his secret.
episodes.title: What Happened to You, Annalise?

episodes.synopsis: While Wes languishes in a psych ward, the group frets that he'll expose their secrets. Meanwhile, Annalise confides in Wes about her past.
episodes.title: She Hates Us

episodes.synopsis: Annalise takes a risky gamble to thwart Philip's blackmailing scheme, and Wes hits the road to learn the truth about his mother's death.
episodes.title: It's a Trap

episodes.synopsis: Wes visits Eve for information about his mother's death. Annalise's desperate measures to stop Philip lead to a dangerous confrontation.
episodes.title: Something Bad Happened

episodes.synopsis: The new assistant district attorney questions the team about Emily Sinclair. Annalise confides in Wes about his mother.
episodes.title: There's My Baby

episodes.synopsis: After skipping town to dodge an arrest warrant, Annalise returns to reveal the serial killer's true identity. Wes learns the truth about his past.
episodes.title: Anna Mae
